data:
Surveillance appointments (clinical Visit):
Annually for physiological stage A & B. Increase frequency for physiological stage C (every 6 - 12 months) and physiolgical stage D (every 3- 6 moths)

Urine, Routine, Collection:T;N once, Order for future visit In Approximately 3 month, CC Provider 2 SPH PACH Clinic, Vancouver - Burrard St

Cardiac Imaging:  Annual Transthoracic Echo (TTE), (can consider every 2 years for Fontan in physiological stage A) not necessary on years when cardiac MRI or CT completed. Consider radiation risk with CT
Routine, Schedule as : Outpatient Scheduling Location: SPH Echo, CC Provider 2 SPH PACH Clinic, Vancouver - Burrard St

CT Cardiac: Every 3-5 years for patients in physiological stage A & B, Every 1-2 years for physiological stage C, annually for physiological stage D. 
Consider radiation risk with CT
Routine, Order for future visit, Scheduling Location: St. Paul's - SPH Med Imaging, CC Provider 2 SPH PACH Clinic, Vancouver - Burrard St
Routine, Order for future visit, Scheduling Location: St. Paul's - SPH Med Imaging, CC Provider 2 SPH PACH Clinic, Vancouver - Burrard St

Cardiopulmonary Stress Test: 
Every 2 years for patients in physiological stage A & B. 
Every 1 Year for physiological stage C. 
At discretionof cardiologist for physiological stage D
Scheduling Location SPH Electrodiagnostic, Special Instructions: Fontan follow up. CC SPH PACH Clinic, Schedule as:Outpatient
Routine, Order for future visit, CC Provider 2 SPH PACH Clinic, Vancouver - Burrard St

Holter Monitor: 
Every 2 years for physiological stage A & B. 
Every 1 years for physiological stage C.
Every year or at the discretion of cardiologist for physiological stage D
Routine, Order for future visit, Schedule as: Outpatient, Schedule Location: SPH Electrodiagnostic, Fontan follow up. CC SPH PACH Clinic
Noninvasive tests (fibroscan) for liver fibrosis every 2-3 years, annually if >30Kpa or >20% increase in stiffness
Liver MRI or multiphase CT every 3 years (Liver ultrasound if MRI or CT not possible)
Routine, Order for future visit, CC Provider 2 SPH PACH Clinic, Vancouver - Burrard St
Routine, Order for future visit, CC Provider 2 SPH PACH Clinic, Vancouver - Burrard St
Referral to Clinic Not Using CST Cerner

Paper Referral, Fibroscan liver surveillance for Fontan associated liver disease, Ramji, Alnoor, MD or Dr. Hin Hin Ko at PACIFIC GASTROENTEROLOGY ASSOCIATES. Please contact PACH clinic to confirm appointment
